ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup strawberries - hulled, halved and sliced

gear.name: Double boiler or heatproof bowl over simmering water

cookingTips: Keep the bottom of the bowl from touching the simmering water to prevent overcooking
Whisk constantly for 7-10 minutes until the mixture reaches 160°F (pasteurization temperature)
Serve zabaglione immediately while still warm and fluffy; do not refrigerate as it will collapse
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through the delicate technique of whisking egg yolks over gentle heat without scrambling them, and explain why immediate serving is essential.
